trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Savoy
There were no other sightings in Savoy on or around
divs: Sighting DetailsMy cousin and I were laying in bed (the is a door to the bedroom to the outside) I saw 7lights in the sky . They were zigging and zagging all over the place Then we blacked out. Next thing we knew there were creatures on the roof. We blacked out again and the nest thing I know the grays were coming in the door about 7 of them We were scared to death. The bed was shaking. They said my cousin was to young. So they took me out to the ship. At this point I closed my eyes. I felt the heat from the craft. They took me on board and stuck something up my nose. Then they stuck a needle? into my bellybutton. The insects were the ones operating. When then took me bacak to my room Zelnoid the one who caused the pain to go away. Said he would see me again. Years later I went to a hypnotism and he did 30 hours of work for free . He is the one who helped me figure out what had happened during the blacked out periods. Years later I had nasal surgery and the doctor wanted to know when I had had nasal surgery before!
